name: league/uri-polyfill
description: Polyfill backporting PHP 8.5+ native RFC3986/WHATWG URI features to lower PHP versions

suggest.ext-intl: to handle IDN host with the best performance
suggest.jeremykendall/php-domain-parser: to further parse the URI host and resolve its Public Suffix and Top Level Domain
suggest.league/uri-components: to provide additional tools to manipulate URI objects components
suggest.symfony/polyfill-intl-idn: to handle IDN host via the Symfony polyfill if ext-intl is not present
suggest.symfony/polyfill-php82: to use the SensitiveParameter polyfill in PHP8.1
suggest.league/uri-polyfill: to backport the PHP URI extension for older versions of PHP
suggest.rowbot/url: to handle URLs using the WHATWG URL Living Standard specification
